name: banettite
effect: Held: Allows Banette to Mega Evolve into Mega Banette.
short_effect: Held: Allows Banette to Mega Evolve into Mega Banette.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Banette hold it, and this stone will
enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
